input.sentences: it was a set but resembled an actual mcdonalds .

output.sentences: The set was meant to resemble a Mcdonalds.
The producer did his best to make it seem like an actual restaurant.
Many moments were captured of people buying food.
Many pictures were taken of people passing by.
There was also a scene shot of it snowing.
